name: How Well Do You Know Movies? Quiz | Name the Movie | 10 Questions

questions.text: Uma Thurman and Ben Affleck predict the future in which movie?
questions.explanation:
Paycheck.

	"Paycheck" is movie about when a scientist (Ben Affleck) discovers a way to predict the future. In the future, certain ordinary items manage to save his life. A cigarette manages to save him from police officers, and a bus ticket manages to save him from henchmen.

questions.text: In what movie do Diane Kruger and Nicholas Cage run around with a valuable piece of American history?
options: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
questions.explanation:
National Treasure.

	"National Treasure" is a movie about a man who has been searching for a treasure for a long time. His family have been searching for 50 years. He faces many obstacles, and people and police try to kill him. His accomplices prove to be helpful and friendly. His adventure starts on the Charlotte ship, and then he is forced to steal the Declaration of Independence, so that he can find this great treasure.

questions.text: In what movie do Owen Wilson and Rachel McAdams get "married"?
questions.explanation:
Wedding Crashers.

	"Wedding Crashers" is an excellent comedy. Owen Wilson and Vince Vaughn star as men who pretend to be invited to weddings, so that they can meet girls. However, when John (Owen Wilson), meets a girl and falls in love with her, things get a little bit complicated! Jeremy (Vince Vaughn) manages to get married in the end, and John manages to kiss the girl who he has loved for one year.

questions.text: In which of the following movies do Salma Hayek and Pierce Brosnan steal diamonds?
options: James Bond: The World is Not Enough
questions.explanation:
After the Sunset.

	Pierce Brosnan and the stunning Salma Hayek play two thieves in "After the Sunset". They want to steal a priceless diamond, and they develop a friendship with the policeman who is trying to catch them. The thieves formulate a plan to steal the diamond, and the policeman outsmarts them, in a clever plan.

questions.text: This John Cleese and Robbie Coltrane movie is in a magical world. Which movie is this?
questions.correct: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
options: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
questions.explanation:
Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.

	John Cleese is Nearly-Headless Nick in the first and second "Harry Potter" movies. In the third, however, he does not appear. Robbie Coltrane acts as Hagrid, and he has one of the best roles in the movie. In "Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets", Harry faces many obstacles, including fighting a basilisk, which is a serpent that kills with its stare.This movie starts when Ron Weasley takes Harry from his room in Privet Drive and takes him to live at his house. When they reach Hogwarts, however, things are very unpleasant. Besides having a teacher whose head needs deflating, there are many attacks on students, and it is up to Harry to save the day.

questions.text: Ben Stiller and Teri Polo make a fool of themselves in which movie?
questions.explanation:
Meet the Parents.

	Ben Stiller acts as the hilarious Greg Focker, who tries to gain the respect and approval of his girlfriend's father (Robert DeNiro). However, the few days he spends with them turn out to be a horrible disaster. He sets the house on fire, loses the family's cat, destroys someone's ashes, and hit's his girlfriend's sister in the eye by mistake.

questions.text: Orlando Bloom and Johnny Depp sail together in which movie?
questions.correct: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
questions.explanation:
Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl.

	"Pirates of the Caribbean" is a movie about a pirate who want to get his ship back. He faces many dangers and only with the help of the blacksmith does he survive. The girl who the blacksmith loves is taken by certain, cursed pirates, because they believe that her blood will help them get rid of the curse.

questions.text: Charlize Theron and Christina Ricci fight the harshness of life in which of the following movies?
questions.explanation:
Monster.

	Charlize Theron plays a highly disturbed, lesbian prostitute who starts killing her clients. Christina Ricci, who plays her girlfriend, is mean and unsupportive. It shows us the roughness, and the harshness of the life some people are living, and how they tend to murder just to protect themselves. Charlize got an Oscar and a Golden Globe for this movie. She also had to gain many pounds.

questions.text: Jeremy Irons and Annette Benning "act" in which movie?
questions.explanation:
Being Julia.

	"Being Julia" is a movie about a woman who acts in theatres. Her husband is cheating on her, and she is cheating on her husband. When she discovers this, she says this in a comical way in front of everyone in the theatre. Annette Benning was nominated for Best Actress at the Oscars.

questions.text: Brad Pitt and Orlando Bloom are on opposing sides of a war in which movie?
options: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
questions.explanation:
Troy.

	"Troy" is set back in the times of the ancient Greeks. A greedy King, Agamemnon, wants to conquer Troy, and he uses Achilles, who was the greatest warrior of the time, to help him. Hector, the defender of Troy, kills Achilles' cousin. Achilles then kills Hector. And to think that all of this was about the Queen of Sparta running off with the Prince of Troy.
